title: Energy conservation - 4 mg sphere with 3 nC charge

content.question: If the moving sphereâ€™s speed is <math alttext="20 meters per second" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mn>20</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>m</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mtext>s</mtext> </mstyle> </math> at Point <math alttext="O" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> and gravitational forces are negligible, what is the speed of the moving sphere when it reaches Point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
